hero.description: Dust collector system that eliminates marble dusts!.

cards.cardTitle: Izmir International Natural Stone and Technologies Fair
cards.cardDescription: In order to meet with Hidrobarsan new technologies and to see the latest technologies that will breathe new life into the marble sector, we are waiting for you, our valued customers, to have a cup of coffee at booth number C226.

about.title: About
cards: We are with you every step of the way

deliciler.name: Y328
deliciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Operator’s Cab
accessories.desc: The new system provides to operator more safety and control comfort with the motion control system.

accessories.title: Slide and Boom
accessories.desc: With the ability to extend and shorten the slide section and to the right and left mobility, and the boom section; it provides easy centering by taking the machine to the balance without moving it.

accessories.title: Diesel Motor
accessories.desc: With the 47 HP Diesel Motor, it easily operates in steeper and difficult terrain conditions.

accessories.title: Compressor
accessories.desc: Both the air and hydraulic systems works more strongly with a single-engine, providing full performance and lighter.

accessories.title: 5.5 cm
accessories.desc: Close to ground performance.

accessories.title: Pipe
accessories.desc: It prevents wear thanks to its increased hardness for the long-lasting use of pipe adapters.

accessories.title: 360° Rotation Capability
accessories.desc: Thanks to its 360° rotating feature, it automatically performs the turn with the operator button, allowing it to cut from all angles.

deliciler.name: Y327
deliciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Operator’s Cab
accessories.desc: The new system provides to operator more safety and control comfort with the motion control system.

accessories.title: Pipe
accessories.desc: It prevents wear thanks to its increased hardness for the long-lasting use of pipe adapters.

accessories.title: Slide and Boom
accessories.desc: With the ability to extend and shorten the slide section and to the right and left mobility, and the boom section; it provides easy centering by taking the machine to the balance without moving it.

accessories.title: Diesel Motor
accessories.desc: With the 47 HP Diesel Motor, it easily operates in steeper and difficult terrain conditions.

accessories.title: Hydraulic Clamp System
accessories.desc: It has a hydraulic clamp system to facilitate pipe disassembly and installation.

accessories.title: 5.5 cm
accessories.desc: Close to ground performance.

accessories.title: Compressor
accessories.desc: Both the air and hydraulic systems works more strongly with a single-engine, providing full performance and lighter.

accessories.title: 360° Rotation Capability
accessories.desc: Thanks to its 360° rotating feature, it automatically performs the turn with the operator button, allowing it to cut from all angles.

deliciler.name: 108T
deliciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Long-Lasting Use Pipe
accessories.desc: Pipe prevents wear thanks to its increased hardness for long-lasting use of pipe adapters.

accessories.title: DTH Hammer (Speed Drill)
accessories.desc: It saves both energy and time by providing faster hole drilling with less air power.

telliKesiciler.name: 6000M
telliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Fully Equipped System
accessories.desc:
Thanks to the new generation inverter systems connected to the feed motor and the main motor; Reduces electricity usage.
It provides high torque for easy wire lifting.
It cuts at maximum performance according to the feature of the stone.
During cutting depends on electricity amperage sets walking speed with inverter automatically.

accessories.title: Slide
accessories.desc: Thanks to the right and left mobility of the sled section, it easily adjust the cutting position without the need to change the machine position.

telliKesiciler.name: 1260M
telliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Flywheel Rotation Button
accessories.desc: Thanks to the automatic flywheel rotation button, it does not need human power to change the working angle.

accessories.title: 360° Rotation Capability
accessories.desc: Thanks to its 360° rotating feature, it automatically performs the turn with the operator button, allowing it to cut from all angles.

accessories.title: Distribution Board and Control Panel
accessories.desc: With the distribution board and control panel on it, it eliminates cable clutter, is easy to carry, and saves time.

telliKesiciler.name: 4000Y
telliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Cutting Rotation
accessories.desc: With its 270° Working Angle, it enables vertical cutting even if the ground on the terrain is not flat.

accessories.title: Rotation System with Reducer
accessories.desc: With the improved Arm System, it can easily change the operating angle without the need for the operator to expend power.

telliKesiciler.name: 3000Y
telliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Cutting Rotation
accessories.desc: With its 270° Working Angle, it enables vertical cutting even if the ground on the terrain is not flat.

accessories.title: Rotation System with Reducer
accessories.desc: With the improved Arm System, it can easily change the operating angle without the need for the operator to expend power.

telliKesiciler.name: 3000M
telliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Locking Mechanism
accessories.desc: Provides operator and machine safety by preventing the motor-flywheel group from falling uncontrollably in case of sudden diamond wire breaks.

zincirliKesiciler.name: HZK8200 DUST COLLECTOR SYSTEM
zincirliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.title: Forklift Transport
accessories.desc: Thus, it provides easy transportation even in tight spaces, Thanks to the new roof system, it offers the possibility of carrying from 4 side and above the machine.

zincirliKesiciler.name: HZK3400 CRAB
zincirliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

accessories.desc: Thus, it provides easy transportation even in tight spaces, Thanks to the new roof system, it offers the possibility of carrying from 4 side and above the machine.

zincirliKesiciler.desc: Uzaktan kumandasının yanı sıra, 8 metrelik kablolama sistemi sayesinde uzaktan kontrol edilebilirlik özelliği de Yengeç zincirli kollu kesme HZK3400 kullanıcılarına kolaylık sağlıyor.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.submitSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible.
contact.submitFailed: Your message could not be sent. Please try again later.
contact.description: You can contact us immediately to get the information you want about our company and products.

privatePersonalInfo.title: Private Personal Information
privatePersonalInfo.description: I understand that the personal information you provide in this section falls within the category of special categories of personal data as defined under Article 6 of the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK). These data will be processed, stored, and transferred in accordance with the "Measures to be Taken by Data Controllers in the Processing of Special Categories of Personal Data" decision issued by the Personal Data Protection Board.

placeholders.health: Do you have any health problems? (Specify)
placeholders.conviction: Have you ever been convicted of a crime? (Specify)

experiences.title: Work and Internship Experiences
experiences.description: List your work and internship experiences starting from your most recent job.

computer.title: Computer Skills

tool.title: Operating System, Database Applications, CASE Tools and Degrees you know

references.title: References
references.description: I understand that the personal information you provide in this section falls within the category of special categories of personal data as defined under Article 6 of the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK). These data will be processed, stored, and transferred in accordance with the "Measures to be Taken by Data Controllers in the Processing of Special Categories of Personal Data" decision issued by the Personal Data Protection Board.

confirm.text: I acknowledge and confirm that I have read and understood the information provided in the Privacy Notice regarding the processing of personal data in the context of this reference process. I further confirm that I have obtained the necessary consents from the owners of the third-party data I have shared with your company for the reference process. I declare and undertake that the information provided is accurate for the operation of this reference process.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.description: Please indicate 3 priority areas you would like to work in and why

placeholders.culturalActivities: What are your cultural and sports activities, if any?
placeholders.organizations: Organizations you are a member of and actively participate in

confirm.0: I understand that you are giving your explicit consent for the personal data provided to be stored for a period of 5 years.
confirm.1: I acknowledge and confirm that I do not give my consent for the processing of personal data.
confirm.2: I confirm and declare that the information provided in this Job Application Form is accurate, complete, and truthful.
confirm.3: I understand that any false or incomplete information may result in the termination of the employment contract without notice or compensation. If hired, I agree to work in accordance with the organization's processes, procedures, and instructions, including the possibility of overtime work when required. I also acknowledge that I may be subject to a probationary period.

personalDataProtection.text: Your communication preferences within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) and the Law on Regulation of Electronic Commerce (ETK) are as follows.

confirm.0: I have read and confirmed the Privacy and Data Protection Policy.
confirm.1: I have read and confirmed the Electronic Commerce Regulation (ETK) text.
